responseA: The label features a small illustration that resembles a heraldic emblem or crest, with what appears to be a lion. This is a common decorative element on coat of arms or family crests and in this context it is stylized and represents the brand or the winery. The presence of the animal in the emblem is quite certain, so on a scale from 0-1, my confidence level is 1. There are no humans visible on the label.
